name: 李宜桓
objective: 本課程的授課內容主要講述各種高分子加工程序與加工技術的種類、包含基礎原理、 機制以及運用。此外也會在課程中介紹目前工業上的生產程序以及相關聯之技術，修習的學生可藉由本課程系統性的了解高分子加工在各式高分子材料之應用與發展。
schedule:
1. Introduction of Polymer Materials (1 week)
1. Synthesis and Fabrication of Polymer Materials  (2 week)
2. Chracterizations of Polymer Materials (2 week)
3. Equation of Continuity (2 week)
4. Compression Molding (1 week)
    Mid-term Exam (1 week)
5. Injection Molding (2 week) 
6. Transfer Molding (2 week)
7. Coating (2 week)
8. Industry Information (2 week)
    Final Exam (1 week)
scorePolicy:
期中考 30%
期末考 40%
出席與作業成績 30%
materials:
“高分子加工”, 陳劉旺, 丁金超, 高立圖書.
“Fundamentals of Polymer Processing”, S. Middleman, McGraw-Hill, New York. 
“Polymer Processing”, J.-F Agassant, P. Avenas, J. –Ph. Sergent and P. J. Carreau, Oxford University Press, New York.
“Textbook of Polymer Science”, 3rd Edition, F. W. Billmeyer, Jr., John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
